scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.swarm:rm: if [ "$CONFIRM_DELETE" != "yes" ]; then echo '❌ Для удаления стека установите CONFIRM_DELETE=yes'; exit 1; fi && docker stack rm bugacity
scripts.docker:dev: docker system prune -f && docker build -t bugacity:latest . && MONGODB_PORT=27017 APP_PORT=3001 docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml bugacity
scripts.docker:prod: docker system prune -f && docker build -t bugacity:latest . && docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml bugacity
scripts.docker:restart:dev: if [ "$CONFIRM_DELETE" != "yes" ]; then echo '❌ Для перезапуска установите CONFIRM_DELETE=yes'; exit 1; fi && npm run swarm:rm && sleep 5 && docker system prune -f && docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.dev.yml bugacity
scripts.docker:restart:prod: if [ "$CONFIRM_DELETE" != "yes" ]; then echo '❌ Для перезапуска продакшн установите CONFIRM_DELETE=yes'; exit 1; fi && npm run swarm:rm && sleep 5 && docker system prune -f && docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml bugacity
